BackstoryDef.title: heir of sparda
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born as the son of the legendary Dark Knight Sparda, [PAWN_nameDef] grew up with incredible natural fighting ability. Despite witnessing [PAWN_possessive] mother's death at a young age, [PAWN_pronoun] developed a carefree attitude to cope with trauma. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood perfecting combat skills while maintaining a love for pizza, rock music, and having fun.

BackstoryDef.title: devil hunter legend
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] established Devil May Cry, a demon hunting business that became legendary across the underworld. [PAWN_pronoun] has mastered multiple fighting styles including Swordmaster, Gunslinger, and Royal Guard. [PAWN_possessive] battles against [PAWN_possessive] twin brother and countless demons have forged [PAWN_objective] into an unstoppable force. Despite [PAWN_possessive] power, [PAWN_pronoun] remains irreverently casual and finds research and art boring compared to the thrill of combat.
